## üìù How to use Stickers

üé® Select the Stickers tool from your annotation toolbar.

üîñ Choose from arrows, labels, markers, or decorative stickers to match what you want to highlight.

üìç Click on your screenshot to place it exactly where you need attention.

üìè Drag to move it or resize it so the highlight is clear and easy to spot.

üß© Layer or mix stickers to organize your feedback or emphasize different steps.

üíæ Your updated screenshot is now ready to share, review, or keep in your library.

üí° Tips

* Use stickers to show reactions or acknowledge comments quickly ‚Äî for example: ‚úÖ Approved, ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs attention, üåü Great idea!

* Combine stickers with annotations or emojis to reinforce your message visually.

* Keep stickers minimal to avoid cluttering your dot ‚Äî 1‚Äì3 per screenshot is usually enough.

* Use stickers consistently across your team to make feedback quickly recognizable.
